reviews.name: Rayovac Indestructible 2D LED Flashlight
reviews.reviewText: WHAT A GREAT LIGHT, THE BEST I'VE OWNED, VERY VERY BRIGHT AND WELL CONSTRUCTED. PRICED RIGHT AND SHIPPED QUICK, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT. OH YEAH, COMES WITH BATTERY'S.
reviews.title: OUTDOOR FLASH LIGHT

reviews.name: Rayovac Indestructible 2D LED Flashlight
reviews.reviewText: Even though the description says 140, this IS the 250 lumens version. It's incredibly; almost painfully bright & the power saver mode can be handy in the middle of the night if you want a less blinding beam. It well built & has a solid & hefty feel. The anodized aluminum body can sometimes feel slippery in your hands, but the rubber ends allow for a solid grip. My only complaint is the beam isn't adjustable.
reviews.title: Incredible Value...This is the Light to Own

reviews.name: Rayovac Indestructible 2D LED Flashlight
reviews.reviewText: I already have a 140 lumens flashlight, however this new flashlight has 250 lumens. Bright is an understatement. This flash light runs on 2 "D" cell batteries and wow. Every women should own one of these. IT's heavy enough to knock the snot out of any perp. and bright enough to temp blind anybody who comes your way
reviews.title: this product is the bomb!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.name: Rayovac Indestructible 2D LED Flashlight
reviews.reviewText:
LOVE THE QUALITY OF LIGHT, BUT YOU SHOULD SPECIFY THAT YOU SHIP UPS SUREPOST FOR US PEOPLE WHO DO NOT RECEIVE HOME MAIL SERVICE SO IT IS NOT SO DIFFUCULT TO RETRIEVE OUR PACKAGE!
THANK YOU!!!!!!!!
reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
